title: Chawanmushi
directions: Prepare your steamer. Bring to a boil over high heat.
Set aside ingredients of your choice. If you are using dried shiitake mushrooms, reconstitute them in hot water. If you are using shrimp, peel and devein.
In a small mixing bowl, whisk together one egg, mirin, soy sauce, salt and dashi broth. Strain the egg mix.
In two rice bowls or tall ramekins, place your prepped ingredients. Divide the egg mix between the two bowls or ramekins, cover with tin foil or plastic wrap.
Reduce the heat of your steamer so the water is at a simmer. Place your bowls into the steamer and cover. Let it steam for 15 to 20 minutes.
Serve hot or chill in the fridge depending on your preference.
